Class GBukkitCorePlugin.GBukkitTPManager

extends java.lang.Object

    Default implementation class for teleportation management.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Method Detail

      • getTeleport

        public QueuedTeleport<Location> getTeleport(Player teleport)
        Description copied from interface: TeleportationManager
        Gets the queued teleportation of the specified player.
        Specified by:
        getTeleport in interface TeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        teleport - The player who's teleport will be returned.
        Returns:
        The last queued teleport of the specified player, or null if none.

      • teleportPlayer

        public QueuedTeleport<Location> teleportPlayer(Player player,
                                      Location targetLoc)
        Description copied from interface: TeleportationManager
        Queues the specified player to be teleported to the specified location after the default delay. Queued teleportation cancelled upon movement or receiving damage. If the player has the permission node gbukkitcore.tpdelay.bypass, the teleportation will be instant.
        Specified by:
        teleportPlayer in interface TeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        targetLoc - The location to teleport to.
        Returns:
        The queued teleport, or null if it was instant.

      • teleportPlayer

        public QueuedTeleport<Location> teleportPlayer(Player player,
                                      Location targetLoc,
                                      int teleportDelay)
        Description copied from interface: TeleportationManager
        Queues the specified player to be teleported to the specified location after the specified delay. Queued teleportation cancelled upon movement or receiving damage.
        Specified by:
        teleportPlayer in interface TeleportationManager
        Parameters:
        player - The player to teleport.
        targetLoc - The location to teleport to.
        teleportDelay - The delay, in seconds, after which the player will be teleported. If this value is 0 OR the player has the permission node gbukkitcore.tpdelay.bypass, the teleportation will be instant.
        Returns:
        The queued teleport, or null if it was instant.
